import React, { useState } from "react"; import './App.css' import data from "./mock-data.json" const App = () => { const [contacts, setContacts] = useState(data); const [addFormData, setAddFormData] = useState({ title:"", message:"", date:"", }) const handleAddFormChange = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const fieldName = event.target.getAttribute("name"); const fieldValue = event.target.Value; const newFormData={ ...addFormData}; newFormData[fieldName] = fieldValue; setAddFormData(newFormData); } return
{contacts.map((contact)=> ( ))}
